extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of 100-level course in ARTH or DRAM or FILM or MUSC and a corequisite of CISC 101 or CISC 110 or CISC 121

basic.description: A multidisciplinary studio-oriented overview of computer-based applications in Art, Music, Drama and Film. History of human-computer interaction. Critical and philosophical issues. Animation. Virtual reality. Computer-aided design. Computer games. Enrollment is limited.
basic.subject: COCA
basic.title: Intro Comp & Creative Arts
